title: The English lawyer a comedy, acted at the Royal Theatre / written by Edvvard Ravenscroft ...
author: Ravenscroft, Edward, 1654?-1707.
publisher: Printed by J. M. for James Vade ...,
notes: A translation and adaptation by Ravenscroft of Ruggle's Latin play, "Ignoramus".
Published in 1736 under title: Ignoramus, or, The English lawyer.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
